Name: Ben
Desc: Use it to obtain the Agent or unlock the Agent's Mindscapes.
Desc2:
Snapshots from Ben's daily life and from in combat, recording important moments before and after he became an Agent.
These images also provide insights into his fighting style and favorite weapons, helping to better understand his strengths.

There are faint traces of sketches on the back, but Ben's erased them all. Hmm... it's really difficult to make out the exact cost of the equipment.
